response.overview: After being broken up with by my girlfriend, “I” am behind not only on rent for my boarding house, but also on tuition. I go to her home under the pretense of coincidence and try calling, but I can’t reach her. After much agonizing, I submit a leave-of-absence form. While talking with a friend I haven’t seen in a long time, “I” decide that suicide is something only humans can do—and the two resolve to die together. This is the earliest work among the surviving productions made by Hongik University’s 'Sound of Light' collective.
response.title: Baechuhuinnabi
